perfectly familiar with the Fortran interface and workspace to configure and prepare all aspects of the coding
use Fortran professionally, starting from zero level!

title: Fortran Programming Complete Course 2022

You will understand the logic of Programming step by step and from scratch, for beginners

title: Fundamentals of CFD using MATLAB code
objectives_summary: You will learn CFD with MATLAB code in this course.
MATLAB code will be used to address various CFD heat transport problems.
My primary goal is to teach you the fundamentals of CFD from beginner to advanced levels.
headline: Fundamentals of CFD from beginner to advanced levels using MATLAB code.

title: Crash Course Digital Electronics
objectives_summary: Core concepts in digital electronics
How a CPU works by building one from scratch
How microprocessors and microcontrollers work and the difference between the two
headline: Master Digital Electronics and Robotics. Go from Zero to building a real CPU !

title: OpenFOAM essential course 2022
objectives_summary: You will be able to solve a CFD in OpenFOAM, understanding all its structure, process and physical meaning
You will understand the logic of OpenFOAM to conduct a complete problem step by step and from scratch, for beginners
You will become familiar with the use of the commands to navigate and configure all aspects of the problem
headline: Learn how to simulate CFD (Computational Fluid Dynamics) problems in OpenFOAM. From scratch and step by step!

title: Basic Multigrid Solvers
objectives_summary: Basics of multigrid solvers for large, sparse systems of linear equations.
headline: Computationally efficient solutions to sparse systems of linear equations.

title: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) for Professionals
objectives_summary: How to carry out mesh sensitivity studies correctly using Richardson Extrapolation
How to choose the best RANS turbulence model
How to find experimental measurements that you can use to validate your CFD
headline: Skills to improve your CFD results

title: Java Native Interface (JNI) in depth
objectives_summary: How to work with Java Native Interface (JNI)
Mixed Java/C++ Development
headline: Gain an in-depth understanding of how to accomplish mixed Java/C++ software development

title: Computational Fluid Dynamics 2
objectives_summary: Implementation of additional types of boundary conditions
Implementation of second-order interpolation for convection terms
Coding for unsteady flows
headline: Further Develop Your Own Working CFD Code: unsteady flows, energy equation, collocated variables, turbulence & more.

title: An Introduction to Optimization for Engineering Students
objectives_summary: Basic Techniques in Engineering Optimization
headline: Write your own optimization codes for basic optimization problems in engineering and related fields.

title: OpenFOAM programming from A to Multi region
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of programming in OpenFOAM
Be able to use and modify the solvers existing in OpenFOAM
Be able to Merge existing solvers and create new ones
headline: Modelling in its utmost capabilities

title: Computational Fluid Dynamics Fundamentals Course 3
objectives_summary: How to setup and structure a working CFD solution code from first principles (using Excel, MATLAB or Python)
How CFD equations are discretised differently for unstructured meshes
How the main mesh quality metrics (aspect ratio, non-orthogonality, skewness, determinant) are calculated
headline: Unstructured Meshes and Mesh Quality

title: The Numerical Solution of ODE's and PDE's
objectives_summary: Basic numerical solution techniques for solving ordinary and partial differential equations.
headline: Introductory numerical methods to solve ordinary and partial differential equations

title: [**UPDATED**] OpenFOAM: From Modeling to Programming
objectives_summary: Be able to create your own solver from scratch by knowing the basics of OpenFOAM programming
Be able to model your own simulations in OpenFOAM
Be able to Modify existing solvers
headline: Unleash your modeling capabilities by making your own solvers

title: Computational Fluid Dynamics Fundamentals Course 2
objectives_summary: How to setup and structure a working CFD solution code from first principles (using Excel, MATLAB or Python)
How Dirichlet and Neumann Boundary Conditions are translated into CFD matrix equations
How to set up and solve 2D CFD solutions from first principles
headline: Wall Functions, 2D Simulations and Boundary Conditions

title: Computational Fluid Dynamics Fundamentals Course
objectives_summary: The fundamentals of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) that are used by engineers, scientists and researchers
How to set up and solve your first CFD solution from first principles (using Excel, Python or MATLAB)
The importance of central differencing, upwind differencing and Peclet number
headline: Fundamentals and First Principles

title: Understanding the Navier-Stokes equations
objectives_summary: Understand the essence of the Navier-Stokes equations and its physical and mathematical meaning.
Clarify misconceptions regarding the application of the Navier-Stokes equations.
Demystify its complexity and obtain confidence in manipulating the Navier-Stokes equations.
headline: Learn the meaning of each term and how to apply them in fluid dynamics problems

objectives_summary: Simulate flows in OpenFOAM.

snappyHexMesh

title: The Complete Introduction to OpenFOAM
objectives_summary: Understand the basic requirements of OpenFOAM computational modelling

Be able to take any tutorial file in OpenFOAM, set the case up for yourself and use geometries and boundaries of your choosing. Though we can't cover the majority of solvers, you should be in a position to explore particular solvers for yourself and learn on your own.
Create meshes and set up boundaries/initial conditions compatible with OpenFOAM
headline: Learn CFD through Solid Mechanics with OpenFOAM and the FOAM-Extend Solid Mechanics library
